title: #92Noon! Falness in for PA! Micheletti/Evason/Sorenson/Russo/Grimm/Talbot
description: --Kevin Falness is in for PA, and as you’d expect it’s a Hockey heavy show. Pat Micheletti is in studio for the first hour talking all things Wild and Gophers Hockey, Wild Head Coach Dean Evason joins ahead of training camp opening up, Gophers Forward Jonny Sorenson joins to talk his season thus far, Michael Russo talks Wild and his excitement to cover hockey again, Mike Grimm breaks up the Hockey show to talk Gophers hoops, and new Wild Goalie Cam Talbot joins to talk about his first few days in the State of Hockey.
